lbl.modal.settings.title: Settings
alert.step1.heading: Step 1
alert.step1.welcomeMessage: Hello! 👋 Welcome to Step 1 of organizing your Secret Santa 🎅! Here you can start by adding participants to the game.
alert.step1.instruction1: 1. Click the ADD button ➕ to enter each participant's name and email.
alert.step1.instruction2: 2. If you need to make changes, use the pen icons ✏️ to edit or the trash can 🗑️ to remove a participant.
alert.step1.instruction3: 3. Once everyone has been added, click NEXT ➡️ to proceed to the next step.
table.participants.heading: List of participants
modal.addParticipantInstruction: Enter the details of the participant you want to add
modal.participantNameHelp: The name that will be displayed in the email
modal.participantEmailHelp: The address to which the email will be sent
alert.step2.heading: Step 2
alert.step2.welcomeMessage: Welcome to Step 2 🌟! Here you can make sure your Secret Santa is perfect for everyone!
alert.step2.description: Sometimes, you might want to prevent some people from giving gifts to each other! Well, this is the step to avoid that! 👍
alert.step2.instruction1: 1. Click on the exclude icon 🚫 to prevent one person from gifting another, avoiding unwanted pairings.
alert.step2.instruction2: 2. After setting your exclusions, click NEXT ➡️ to continue.
alert.step2.instruction3: 3. If you want to review your choices, click BACK ⬅️ to return to the previous step.
modal.excludeParticipants.title: Exclude participants
alert.step3.heading: Step 3
alert.step3.welcomeMessage: Here we are at Step 3 🥳, the final step before unleashing the party!
alert.step3.instruction1: 1. Check the Participants summary table 👀 to make sure everything is correct.
alert.step3.instruction2: 2. If everything is perfect, press SEND! ✉️ to shuffle the names and find out who you will give the gift to! 🎁
alert.step3.instruction3: 3. If changes are needed, use the BACK button 🔙 to make the necessary corrections.
alert.step3.closingRemark: Ready for the most exciting gift exchange of the year? Let's start the countdown! 🎅🎁⏰
